content: Matteo Cimini Matteo Cimini Assistant Professor Miner School of Computer & Information Sciences Kennedy College of Sciences University of Massachusetts Lowell Address: Miner School of Computer & Information Sciences University of Massachusetts Lowell 1 University Ave. Lowell, MA 01854 Office: Dandeneau Hall, office 324 Phone: 978-934-3682 Email: matteo_cimini [A_T] uml [DOT] edu Research Interests Programming languages, formal methods, type systems, programming language validation and verification, gradual typing, interactive theorem proving, concurrency theory, process algebra, bisimulation and coinductive techniques. Publications Recent News New! Oct. 2025, CongruenceTool is out! Based on the work of my (former) students Merlyn and Nikolaos. New! Aug. 2025, Paper accepted at ICTAC 2025. New! Aug. 2025, my Ph.D. student Joan and I have a paper accepted in Science of Computer Programming. March. 2025: I am part of the organization of NEPLS, the New England Programming Languages and Systems Symposium at UMass Lowell in May 2025. In 2025: Joined the PC of FORTE 2026. In 2025: PC member of IFL 2025, SLE 2025, FORTE 2025, and ICE 2025. Nov. 2024: Nico, Eswar, and I have a paper accepted at Marjan Sirjani's Festschrift. Nov. 2024: My master's student Eswar successfully defended a master's thesis on Lang-n-Prove, congrats! Current Work: Lang-n-X series of systems: You can watch overview videos of the systems in this series below. (Videos assume familiarity with Programming Language Theory.) You can also read an overview of the series here (pdf, 4 pages + references). (Most recent tool is Lang-n-Assert.) Lang-n-Play: A Programming Language with Languages as First-class Citizens. video (~12 mins), slides. Lang-n-Send: Processes That Send Languages. video (~10 mins), slides. Lang-n-Change: A DSL for Language Transformations. video (~10 mins), slides. Lang-n-Check: (Extrinsic) Type Systems for Language Definitions. video (~10 mins), slides. Lang-n-Prove: A Proof Language for Language Proofs. video (~10 mins), slides. Lang-SQL (or Lang-n-Query): A Query Language for Querying Languages. video (~12 mins), slides. Lang-n-Assert: From Program Logics to Language Logics. video, coming soon. If you think that a talk about the Lang-n-X series can be a nice keynote speech, please contact me.
